row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
row.description: Attach the binary for Docker package

row.process:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.STORE" ,"DOCKER", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_DKR_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"docker-tool.jar")
